item.title: Getting Started Hugo 1 of 3
item.description: This will be the first post in a short series about getting started with hugo. By the end of this you will have a dead simple proof of concept site which we will build on in later posts. Next in this series Getting Started Hugo 2 of 3 Getting Started Hugo 3 of 3 Static site generators such as Hugo are great for sites that donâ€™t have any particular reason for dynamic (database driven) content; or for simple sites where the ‘dynamic’ content you do have rarely changes.
